verses.verse: Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2204>him<s%>, Thou art old and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%>, and there <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> yet <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to be <S%H3423>possessed<s%>.
This is the <S%H776>land<s%> that yet <S%H7604>remaineth<s%>: all the <S%H1552>regions<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and all the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%>;

from the <S%H7883>Shihor<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>, which is <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> to the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>; the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; the <S%H5841>Gazites<s%>, and the <S%H796>Ashdodites<s%>, the <S%H832>Ashkelonites<s%>, the <S%H1663>Gittites<s%>, and the <S%H6139>Ekronites<s%>; also the <S%H5761>Avvim<s%>,

on the <S%H8486>south<s%>; all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and <S%H4632>Mearah<s%> that belongeth to the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%>, unto <S%H663>Aphek<s%>, to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>;

and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1382>Gebalites<s%>, and all <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%>, from <S%H1171>Baal-gad<s%> under <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> unto the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>;

all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> unto <S%H4956>Misrephoth-maim<s%>, even all the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%>; them will I drive <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: only <S%H5307>allot<s%> thou it unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as I have commanded <S%H6680>thee<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H2505>divide<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

With him the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5676>them<s%>, beyond the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, even as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> gave <S%H5414>them<s%>:

from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, that is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and all the <S%H4334>plain<s%> of <S%H4311>Medeba<s%> unto <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>;

and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>;

and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and <S%H4602>Maacathites<s%>, and all <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>, and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> unto <S%H5548>Salecah<s%>;

all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and in <S%H154>Edrei<s%> (the same was <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>); for these did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%>, and drove them <S%H3423>out<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> not out the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%>, nor the <S%H4602>Maacathites<s%>: but <S%H1651>Geshur<s%> and <S%H4602>Maacath<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Only unto the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, made by <S%H801>fire<s%> are his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as he spake unto <S%H1696>him<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, that is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> that is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and all the <S%H4334>plain<s%> by <S%H4311>Medeba<s%>;
Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and all its <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are in the <S%H4334>plain<s%>; <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, and <S%H1120>Bamoth-baal<s%>, and <S%H1010>Beth-baal<s%>-meon,
and <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>, and <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%>, and <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%>,
and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%>, and <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>, and <S%H6890>Zereth-shahar<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%>,
and <S%H1047>Beth-peor<s%>, and the slopes of <S%H798>Pisgah<s%>, and <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth<s%>,

and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, and all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> with the <S%H5387>chiefs<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H189>Evi<s%>, and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, and <S%H7254>Reba<s%>, the <S%H5257>princes<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%>, the <S%H7080>soothsayer<s%>, did the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> among the <S%H413>rest<s%> of their <S%H2491>slain<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> was the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5159>thereof<s%>. This was the inheritance of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and the villages <S%H2691>thereof<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, and all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, unto <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>;
and from <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> unto <S%H7434>Ramath-mizpeh<s%>, and <S%H993>Betonim<s%>; and from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%>;

and in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, <S%H1027>Beth-haram<s%>, and <S%H1039>Beth-nimrah<s%>, and <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H6829>Zaphon<s%>, the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7097>thereof<s%>, unto the uttermost part of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and the villages <S%H2691>thereof<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> inheritance unto <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H7626>half-tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: and it was for <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%>, all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, all the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and all the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%>, which are in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>:

and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>, and <S%H154>Edrei<s%>, the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, were for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, even for the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

These are the <S%H5157>inheritances<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> distributed in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.

But unto the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, is their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as he spake unto <S%H1696>them<s%>.
